thoughts: Mewls pitifully for milk
Wobbles around the Dark Forest
Is crying for milk to no avail
Attempts to snarl but can only manage a tiny mewl
Is crying for {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents, but no one comforts {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Doesn't know why it's suddenly so cold
Wishes to feel warmth at least once
Hears menacing whispers around {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is clouded in confusion and fear
Feels trapped in the sticky mud
Is feeling incredibly lonely
Feels swallowed by the abyss
Feels nothing but fear
Is blindly spitting and hissing
Never got to hear {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} name
Doesn't understand what's going on
Barely keeps {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head out of the mud
Rolls around in the muck
Tries to open {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes, but has {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face covered in mud
Snuggles against the shadows
Is wailing
Paws at a puddle of goop
Finds no comfort in the endless shadows
Toddles around, trying to find {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent to nurse
Sputters and coughs in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep
Feels so lost all the time
Desperately misses r_c
Misses the fleeting feeling of warmth at r_c's belly
Wishes that r_c could bathe {PRONOUN/m_c/object} again
